title: iMac A1419
message: Yes the iMac was splashed with water long time ago i removed all there was no damage inside besides the audio jack but that i solved there was a capacitor shorted removed and stopped the beeps. The client decided to sell it for parts 2years ago and it stayed like that since then :D I tried with a new SSD cause the old the client took it

title: iMac A1419
message:
We have recent threads about similar problem, in the last two days.
You lose lot of important information "bypassing" other threads than your ones.

I have no idea what board you have there (secret good kept) and I cannot make any component reference.
Talking about SATA SSD connector (not on MLB), tie pin 11 to 10, or 12 (ground).
